'''Whirl of Chalchiuhtlicue''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Land of Tleyaoyotl]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 138]].

==Trivia==
* <section begin=WhirlofChalchiuhtlicueLeitmotif />The following soundtracks share Whirl of Chalchiuhtlicue's leitmotif ''(unofficial name)'':
** [[Whirl of Chalchiuhtlicue]] (0:03)
** [[A Harvest of Dreams]] (0:02)<section end=WhirlofChalchiuhtlicueLeitmotif />
===Etymology===
* {{W|Chalchiuhtlicue}} meaning "she of the jade skirt" in {{W|Nahuatl}}, is an {{W|Aztec mythology|Aztec}} deity of water, storms, and baptism.
